com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service

Class WatsonService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlchemyService, ConversationService, DialogService, DocumentConversion, LanguageTranslation, LanguageTranslator, NaturalLanguageClassifier, PersonalityInsights, PersonalityInsights, RetrieveAndRank, SpeechToText, TextToSpeech, ToneAnalyzer, TradeoffAnalytics, VisualRecognition

    public abstract class WatsonService
extends Object
    Watson service abstract common functionality of various Watson Services. It handle authentication and default url
    See Also:
    IBM Watson Developer Cloud
